game.name: 垂钓大师 FishingMaster
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: "Fishing Master" is an idle fishing, collecting, and nurturing game. You can fish through [online/offline] idle mode, earning substantial funds to purchase various items. You can also exchange items with other players via the in-game marketplace.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Fishing Master" is an idle fishing, collecting, and nurturing game. You can fish through [online/offline] idle mode, earning substantial funds to purchase various items. You can also exchange items with other players via the in-game marketplace.
